import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import "./styles.css"; import ReactPlayer from "react-player"; import axios from "axios"; const HighPerformanceSolutions = () => { const [ blogs, setBlogsState ] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const configuration = { params: {} } axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL}/gather/all/blogs/forward/facing`, configuration).then((res) => { if (res.data.message === "Gathered blogs!") { console.log(res.data); const { blogs } = res.data; setBlogsState(blogs); } else { console.log("Err", res.data); } }).catch((err) => { console.log(err); }) }, []); console.log("blogs", blogs); return (

Hire Hackers To Test Your Company's Security.

At The Hacker Marketplace, we take away the need for you to find a hacker and manage the process in order to test your company's security. We offer a marketplace where you can post your job, hackers will apply, and then you review our candidates and hire one or even multiple contractors. You get access to all of the hacker's work completedâ€”from start to finish- on our platform as soon as new submissions are processed for piece of mind & assurance along the way!
